resources.string: First Aid Quiz

First aid knowledge is very important for both you and your community, It enables you to assist persons who are in emergency situations until help arrives. 
 
 This is a short and simple quiz to test your knowledge about first aid, it consists of five questions which are covering different aspects. 
 
 Each correct answer gives you one point, Good luck..
